mapper.select: SELECT up.*, o.orgname, o.orgcode FROM sys_user_pos up LEFT JOIN sys_org o ON o.orgid=up.orgid WHERE userid = #{userId} and up.isDelete = 1

SELECT up.userPosId, up.userId, up.orgId, up.posId, up.jobId, up.isPrimary, up.isCharge, o.orgName, o.orgCode, p.posName, j.jobName,j.enterprise_code AS enterpriseCode FROM sys_user_pos up INNER JOIN sys_org o ON o.orgid=up.orgid INNER JOIN sys_pos p ON p.posid=up.posid INNER JOIN sys_job j ON j.jobid=up.jobid WHERE userid = #{userId} and up.isDelete=0
